banners:
WARNING If the banner uses symbols (★ or & for example) and is a Step Up, Record Crystal, or Step Up v2 scout, refrain from using those symbols and use the names instead.
i.e. - "5★ Upgrade Vote Scout" -> "5 Star Upgrade Vote Scout" - "Memory of Friendship & Passing of Time" -> "Memory of Friendship and Passing of Time"
Doing this will ensure that there will be no errors when parsing the Banners.xml file. <-->
BANNER TYPES As of this writing, The following banner types are available:
0) Normal (Static scout rates, nothing special) 1) Step Up (Increased gold character scout rate per step, resets at 5) 2) Record Crystal (Get record crystals every multi scout to use in a guaranteed scout) 3) Step Up v2 (Increased platinum character scout rate per step, repeats at 6) 4) Birthday Step Up (125 MD scout on step 1, 2.0x rates for gold and platinum on step 3, resets at 3) 5) Record Crystal v2 (Same as Record Crystal, but 125 MD for the first scout.) 6) Memorial Scout (Static scout rates, single pulls only.) 7) Step Up v3 (125 MD scout on step 1, 2.0x rates for platinum on step 3, resets at 3) 8) Record Crystal v3 (Same as Record Crystal v2, but get 1-5 RC back every record crystal scout) 9) Event (Free, single pulls only, and no hacking crystals on duplicate characters) 10) SAO Game 5th Anniversary Step Up (Same rates as Step Up v2, just different MD costs) 11) Record Crystal v4 (Same as Record Crystal v3, but platinum base rates have increased by 1.5x) 12) Step Up v4 (Same as Step Up v2, but 50% discount on Step 1 and 3 and increased platinum base rates by 1.5x) 13) Step Up v5 (Same as Step Up v2, but 50% discount on Step 1 and increased platinum base rates by 1.5x) 14) SAO Game 5th Anniversary Step Up v2 (Same as SAO Game 5th Anniversary Step Up, but increased platinum base rates by 1.5x) 15) Step Up v6 (Same as Step Up v3, but rates for platinum characters are 1.5x higher.) 16) SAO Game 5th Anniversary Step Up v3 (Same as SAO Game 5th Anniversary Step Up, but a gold+ rarity character is guaranteed on the first step.) 17) Step Up v7 (Same as Step Up v2, but 50% discount on Step 1, 200 MD Step 3 w/ 1.5x increased rates for platinum6 characters, guaranteed platinum6 character on step 5, and repeating step 6 with 2x platinum6 rates.) 18) Record Crystal v5 (Same as Record Crystal v4, but circulating record crystals are not obtainable.)
0) Normal (Static scout rates, nothing special) 1) Step Up (100 MD scout on step 1, 2.0x rates for gold weapon on step 3) 2) GGO Step Up (100 MD scout w/ guaranteed Copper+ Automatic Rifle, 1.5x rates for Gold on step 3, Guaranteed Gold on step 5, and 2.0x rates for Gold on step 6, repeats at 6) 3) Step Up v2 (100 MD scout step 1, 100 MD + 1.5x rates for gold weapon on step 3, guaranteed gold weapon step 5, and 2.0x rates for gold weapons on step 6, repeats at 6)
- "GoldBanner" (Included in the pool for Record Crystal guaranteed scouts) - "GoldBannerv2" (Included in the pool for Record Crystal v2 guaranteed scouts) - "PlatinumBanners" (Included in the pool for Step Up v7 scouts)
Use this tag to stop a certain character from being used in GoldBanner/GoldBannerv2/PlatinumBanners/etc Type prefix, name, and rarity separated by semicolons. Any spaces must be turned into underscores. Only functions for Step Up v7 (17) and higher banner types. i.e: Black_Swordsman;Kirito;4
Type the desired number between the area in a banner. <-->
